utils.topikSchedule: Usoro Vievlogg - na-abịa ma ọ bụrụ na ọ na-amụ ihe

utils.notFound: Enweghị nkuzi dị na ụdị a.

content.title: Vievlog - Free na ntanetị ọ na-amụ | Nkuzi, akụrụngwa na asambodo
content.signUp: Debanye aha ya na ọmụmụ ya
content.startLearningNow: Bido na-amụta ya ma kwadebe maka ule taa
content.whyChooseVieVlog: Gini mere eji amuta ya na vievlog?
content.learnIT: Nwee nkuzi ọ bụla, nkuzi, na akụrụngwa nke ndị nkuzi nwere ahụmahụ - n'efu.
content.expertInstructors: Mụta Ihe Ndị E Si Nweta Ndị Ọmụma
content.learnFromExperts: A kuziiri ya ndi okacha amara na ndi nkuzi.
content.anytimeAnywhere: Reconible mmụta mmụta ọ bụla, ebe ọ bụla
content.coverAllAspects: Ekpuchi ntọala maka ya dị elu, ọ bụ echiche gụnyere ịkọwapụta, sistemụ, ngbanwe, na ndị ọzọ.
content.viewAllIT: Chọgharịa usoro Vievlogrog niile na nnwale
content.whatOurLearnersSay: Ihe ndị na-amụ ihe na-ekwu banyere Vevlog

testimonial1.quote: Vievlog nyeere m aka iji obi ike gafere ule asambodo m.
testimonial1.name: Nguyen Minh Ah

testimonial2.quote: Mụta ya site na Vievlog na-atọ ụtọ ma na-atọ ụtọ!
testimonial2.name: Tran Haa Nam

testimonial3.quote: Daalụ Velamlog, m na-eme ka mmemme m na-eme mmemme.
testimonial3.name: Le thy huoon

content.yourOneStopShop: Igwe okwu gị na-akwụsị iji ma kwado ya ma kwadebe maka nyocha asambodo. Nweta ọdịnaya adịchaghị akwụ ụgwọ!

metadata.lesson: Nyochaa nkuzi anyị n'efu ma họrọ ụzọ zuru oke dakọtara na ọkwa gị.
metadata.grammar: Chọpụta nkuzi zuru ezu na eserese.
